summary:
This Mod has the following:-
A custom race with custom powers.
Two player homes, one with a small quest for the start of the game, one in Solstheim.
Two horse's one in Riverwood, one in Sostheim.
Custom weapons, Armor and clothes.
A Follower who will level with player and can be married.
and much more.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES ALL DLC.

This mod is a collection of all my old and simple mods all in one .esp.

It has the following:-

A custom race called the Clann with custom powers.

Two house's. One in Riverwood with a small Note Quest, go to Embershard mine and loot the dead body in the cell, he has the key to the home. And the second house is in Solsthiem, just use the boat on the river just outside the house. The same Key is required for all locks, If the dead body is not there/can't be found then the key can be created at any forge.

Two horse's one in Riverwood, one in Solstheim. 

A follower who will level with the Player, can also be married.

A custom potion that can be made at any cook fire.

Weapons and Armor.

New arrow and bolts found under the steel smithing tree.

Changes to the weight of firewood as I play with Frostfall.

Changes to the Steel ingot recipe 


All assets are Vanilla so there will be no conflict, though if you find any then please post, and Endorsments are always welcome, Enjoy ;-) .
author: minesawhiskey
